content.text:
# Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress – Motion Picture

}}
The Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress – Motion Picture is a Golden Globe Award that was first awarded by the Hollywood Foreign Press Association in 1944 for a performance in a motion picture released in the previous year.
The formal title has varied since its inception; since 2005, the award has officially been called "Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role in a Motion Picture".
Winners and nominees
won twice for Mrs. Parkington (1944) and Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte (1963)]]
won twice for The Picture of Dorian Gray (1945) and The Manchurian Candidate (1962)]]
won for ''Gentleman's Agreement (1947)]]
won for Harvey (1950)]]
won for Mogambo (1953)]]
won for The Bad Seed (1956)]]
won for Psycho (1960)]]
won for West Side Story (1960)]]
won for The V.I.P.s (1963)]]
won for twice for Inside Daisy Clover (1956) and Rosemary's Baby (1968)]]
won for Thoroughly Modern Millie (1967)]]
won for Cactus Flower (1969)]]
won twice for Five Easy Pieces (1970) and The Great Gatsby (1974)]]
won for Carnal Knowledge (1971)]]
won for The Poseidon Adventure (1972)]]
won for Voyage of the Damned (1976)]]
won for Julia (1977)]]
won twice for Kramer vs. Kramer (1979) and Adaptation (2002)]]
won for Melvin and Howard (1980)]]
won for Tootsie (1982)]]
won for Silkwood (1983)]]
won for A Room with a View (1986)]]
won for Working Girl (1988)]]
won for Steel Magnolias (1989)]]
won for Ghost (1990)]]
won for Enchanted April (1991)]]
won for The Age of Innocence (1993)]]
won for Mighty Aphrodite (1995)]]
won for The Mirror Has Two Faces (1996)]]
won for Girl, Interrupted (1999)]]
won for Almost Famous (2000)]]
won for Cold Mountain (2003)]]
won for Closer (2004)]]
won for The Constant Gardner (2005)]]
won for I'm Not There (2007)]]
won twice for The Reader (2008) and Steve Jobs (2015)]]
won for Precious (2009)]]
won for The Help (2011)]]
won for Les Misérables (2012)]]
won for American Hustle (2013)]]
won for Boyhood (2014)]]
won for Fences (2016)]]
won for I, Tonya (2017)]]
won for If Beale Street Could Talk (2018)]]
won for Marriage Story (2019)]]
won for The Mauritanian (2020)]]
won for West Side Story (2021)]]
won for The Holdovers (2024)]]
